title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 61-3.4 - Qualifications
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 61-3.4 - Qualifications

State Regulations

The general provisions set forth at section
61-1.4
of this Part shall apply
under this Subpart except as follows: (a) Age. The minimum age of each applicant
for a certificate of competence shall be 21 years of age. (b) Experience. The minimum necessary
experience for each applicant shall be three years practical experience in the
operation of cranes and, in addition, practical knowledge of crane
maintenance. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
61-3.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
